column4: Do you know for sure that it isn't already configured automatically by the OS, try turning on Bluetooth by clicking the icon on the menu bar, for instance. The default setting for BT is off and not broadcast, as far as I've experienced. Also, from the universal power button>>System Settings>>Bluetooth
Okay, I'm glad it worked out.
Interestingly enough, a lot more people are getting that error message with Ubuntu, it seems, than with other OSes or even distributions.
I bet it is, I wish I could help more, on that problem anyway, but that's about all I can say on the subject of why you can't transfer those files.
